website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable wearable vacuum that packs a lot of power into a lightweight design. 48-foot power cable.
pros: If you need a more powerful model to handle a variety of tough jobs, this is your best option
With the padded harness and 9.2-pound design, this vacuum can be worn for long stretches without discomfort
Large selection of attachments for dealing with debris in crevices or under furniture
cons: The long wand may prove challenging for home use
Included bag is challenging to empty

website_summaries.verdict: Designed with the help of chiropractors to be as comfortable as it is powerful.
pros: 48-foot cord is made with a three-wire design for added durability
Comes with an accessory pack that features six useful tools
Bagless design saves money and is good for the environment
cons: This Hoover model is not compatible with other Hoover vacuum attachments

customer_reviews.title: it's one of the best! (I also own a ProTeam backpack vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I am renovating a large house (tearing down walls, cutting wood, etc) and this little vac is a workhorse! Compared to the price of other shoulder vacuums, this one is a steal! And, in my opinion, it's one of the best! (I also own a ProTeam backpack vacuum, which is also great, but costs twice as much)
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: They need to make the attachments and pole handle more durable
customer_reviews.text: It has MAJOR defects when it come to its attachments everything that came with mine are broken even the poles dont stay snapped in place and my attachments have cracks down the sides of all the plastic ones and the extension cord prongs came completely off haven't even had 1yr and I spent $259 dollars... the attachments dont stay on so its useless.
customer_reviews.author: Toleto

customer_reviews.title: Cheap backpack type straps are plastic and break easily.
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this cheap product. It has cheap plastic straps break when you tighten them. I have only used my unit 5 or 6 times and it has broken straps. A average backpack has better straps. I bought this because it was supposed to be quiet and a backpack. I thought a back pack style would work. The metal hose is also at a terrible angle and does not adjust for going under beds or furniture. Do NOT purchase without seeing a product like this in person. This is the problem with buying online. It also is huge behind your back. You will bang into things behind you if you are not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Murphy-Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Attachments are cumbersome.
customer_reviews.text: The primary issue with this vaccum are the attachments. There is this really odd "ring" attachment system where you have to screw an attachment piece on, while somehow engaging a metal ring to get a snug connection. It made it exceptionally difficult to attach different pieces. I could manage this maybe 1 out of 20 or 30 tries. As others have mentioned, the "S" tube is pretty huge. Too big if you're under 5'9 or so, so shorter users beware. The cannister is also pretty large, not majorly so, but you need to attend to your workspace or you'll back into things. Overall, it would be great, but the attachment issue makes this unusable.
customer_reviews.author: badchad

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time and money on this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very surprised to see so many good reviews for this vacuum cleaner . Honestly this was the worst purchase ever . First this is way too heavy to have on your back for so long , after using for fifteen minutes my back and shoulders were so painful. The attachments are horrible , a pain to change them. The suction of the vacuum cleaner it’s ok but it’s just very uncomfortable to have the heavy weight on your back awhile cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Bine Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Not good for residential use
customer_reviews.text: Does not work well in a home where there is limited room for maneuvering. The length of the "wand" cannot be reduced for the use of the attachments, so every attachment has a full length wand. Further, the floor attachments don't swivel, so maneuvering it requires large movements of the lengthy wand. This makes the backpack extremely awkward and nearly unusable in bathrooms, laundry rooms, etc. I think it would be fine for large office spaces. I especially liked the clear view to the bag, strong suction, replaceable extension cord, and the size/weight. We previously had an Aspira backpack and used it for about 15 years, but it had much better maneuverability.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: The attachments are the best I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: I thought I read somewhere that it weighed 11 lbs. Not true, regardless, this thing rocks. So much faster than the Dyson (POC) that I own, and it picks up cheerio's too, instead of just pushing them around! The attachments are the best I've ever seen. When worn properly, you hardly notice it. I believe it can be hung off the back of a wheelchair, and intend to confirm this soon. Read somewhere about problems with the wand, but I have no issues, it's light, stays put together, and stays attached to the hose. 50 ft hose is great.
customer_reviews.author: JBoz

customer_reviews.title: STRONG. Great Professional Vacuum. Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: [UPDATE] After 2 years I am expanding and ordering my 2nd unit. Very durable. Low cost replacement parts. partswarehouse dot com {Ever since I ordered this vacuum my customers are thoroughly impressed with our cleaning services. Even though the device was used its been over 24 months and device still works very well. So far I have to replace the rubber gasket bag filter due to one of my workers suctioning water into the vacuum. Beware the replacement parts are expensive but thankfully we have Amazon for alternative. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Terrance J Alexander

customer_reviews.title: It really SUCKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good vacuum. Maybe the best for the money. Big plus is the availability of parts and options. Can be serviced for years of use. Made properly for commercial environments so it's more than capable of large mansions or estates. Small houses are done super fast. Great for all types of floors, walls, ceilings, blinds chairs and sofas. Also great for car truck or other things. Filtration is top notch. Not loud at all for the given power!!!
customer_reviews.author: SammyP

customer_reviews.title: This machine totally sucks..
customer_reviews.text: This machine totally sucks...which is exactly what I was hoping. It is a hard surface floor cleaning masterpiece. I have a 2000+ sqft farmhouse with a mix of hardwood, laminate, and tile. It excel at all of them with the included floor tool. Cleaned the whole place in record time and never had to change outlets thanks to the extra long cord. I love this thing and it is so fun to use I clean more often...an unexpected bonus. There are other reviews that try to steer you too more expensive -010 version...I think this machine is a better option for a household. Save the extra hundred bucks.
customer_reviews.author: kevin randy collins

customer_reviews.title: I love the pre-filter
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars but the wand attachment where you have to depress the button and slide the two parts of the wand together is failing other than that this vacuum is a power house. I use this on the clean up of all of my flooring jobs. It greatly reduces labor and it more efficient than sweeping or swiffering. I love the pre-filter!!! Yes, you have to take it out of the vacuum to clean it and yes its dusty but do it outside, use an air nozzle to blow the dust off of it! I haven't changed the main filter yet! New Life Flooring, LLC Kyle McElroy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: over heats
customer_reviews.text: Over heats after about a 1/2 hour of using continuously.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every pet vacuum on the market and had them all die very quickly. I developed a pretty bad dog hair allergy during pregnancy. I have a husky shepherd so I can really tell when a vacuum actually works. This sucker sure does the trick! My eyes aren’t on fire anymore and my back doesn’t hurt from trying to get weird angles. Thank you thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Soooo many amazon boxes

customer_reviews.title: Love it if the attachments would stay on.
customer_reviews.text: This vac has great suction, not too heavy. The manual isn't as helpful as one would hope. I can not figure out how to attach the floor tools to the hose and not have them fall back out. I wonder if there is a missing part? I have contacted product support. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Rezelette

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: Having attachment issues. Small two part round brush tool falls off. This is my most used tool. Wish it had a straight poll attachment as part of the set. The long bent one is aquard for some tasks. Going to try and call customer service can you please call me!! 832-289-9382 as soon as I have the time. I'll update my review after I speak to them. Otherwise....I love this vac. I own a cleaning business. Do lots of post contlstruction cleans and this is a just what I needed. Helps withneck and back pain too. Love this for hardwood floors. I also cleaned both vehicles with it over the weekend. It's fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Bird

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, and picks up everything
customer_reviews.text: If you have tile, wood, concrete, or any other hard surface flooring, this is the vaccum. It is light ,comfortable, and picks up everything. The floor attachments work and swivel around almost everything. The brush attachment i use for dusting and works great as opposed to spreading it everywhere wiping.it works awesome on baseboards without even having to bend over. The other i use on the couch and rugs. You could clean walls ceilings and fans with this thing. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: pbl57lsu

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: We have hardwood floors and stairs, and this has made cleaning them much easier. I've used this for spot-cleaning our area rugs, but I would not recommend for trying to vac an entire rug or carpet. This vac gets into tight corners, under beds and behind furniture very easily. And I love not having to use a dust pan and brush on our staircase. The velcro belt feature on the backpack is well made and although range of motion is limited to a degree, I didn't feel like I would hurt my back. Very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Peel

customer_reviews.title: Easy vacuuming
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a back pack vacuum ever since I experienced one where I worked. Easy to get on and off. It is easy to clean, be sure to purchase the paper disposable bags along with the vacuum for easier cleaning of the vacuum itself. The noise level is slightly quieter than what I'm used to, which is nice. The cord is nice and long. The on/off button is easy to get to. The strap going across the chest would have been better if it were padded as well. The only down side is there isn't a bag or compartment holder for the tools. Very happy with the suction power of the vacuum and tools to clean with.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I own a cleaning company and this is the best vacuum and most cost efficient! No back pain after cleaning or vacuuming all day with this because it's weight and support is balanced evenly. The only down side is having to clean the filter out daily...it's not a bad thing just regular maintenance. This cut our cleaning time in half. Probably not realistic if you're just using it seldom to never. Very efficient for commercial use though.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed this new backpack vac for our small commercial cleaning business. The cord is really long so I only have to move the cord a few times for the whole office space. The vacuum makes quick work of sweeping the floors and is much more effective than a dust mop or broom/dustpan situation. I've also used at my home and loved that I could vacuum my popcorn ceilings with ease! My only complaint is the plastic "guard" that protects the filter at the base of the unit is made of plastic and has broken off completely just after a few weeks of normal wear. Overall, i would recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G.

customer_reviews.title: Kinda inconvenient and annoying for mediocre suction
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about a year now. I find that needing extra extension cords is very inconvenient (the cord built in is a few inches long.) It doesn't suck-up as powerful as other canisters I've used, which is disappointing because this one is billed as commercial. The attachments are annoyingly designed to only work in specific, awkward configurations.
customer_reviews.author: OmiCakes

customer_reviews.title: Suction is amazing, gets a little heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum, so far the suction is fantastic. I run a commercial cleaning business and i've used many a vacuums, this is by far one of the better ones! Comes with a bunch of attachments, the vacuum heads are nice because they get close to the wall and in corners well. The only down side of this vacuum is its a little bulky at first to get used too, and it gets quite heavy on my shoulders (and i'm a strong woman). I notice If i take my time with breaks between sections i'm ok! Definitely recommend for the strong person!
customer_reviews.author: corin krainer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, good power, just works
customer_reviews.text: Not very heavy, has good suction, easy to empty. The only problem i have with this vacuum is the attachments are difficult to remove after heavy use. I guess they just get jammed in after a while. It takes 2 people to get them disconnected. Also, the button to dismantle the long aluminum suction pole is easily twisted with vigorous usage. I have to re-align the button in the hole from time to time. Best suction is when the lowest bend in the aluminum pipe is closer to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: SanfordTurbo

customer_reviews.title: Not as versatile as hoped
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum thinking I could use it to vacuum the walls of my log home. The dust and upholstery attachments only attach to the hose so for my log walls there is no extended reach. Add to this the fact that an adapter is necessary to use these attachments which if misplaced makes them totally worthless. There is no conceivable way to attach them to the extensions so your reach is very limited. Sounded like a good vacuum but really not versatile at all.
customer_reviews.author: mtnmama

customer_reviews.title: Great vac!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum! It has amazing power and is much easier to use than other vacs. You stand up straight to use, so it's much better on the back! The wand allows you to clean under beds, sofas, chairs, etc. Entire house done in 35 minutes (vs. 90 min. with former vac.) We like it and definitely recommend it. We have only hardwood and a few rugs. No carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Bamajhh

customer_reviews.title: I really like this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I really like this vacuum. It is solid and has great suction power. I have wood floors on three stories so the backpack feature is very useful to me. It comes with a long cord so I can essentially get all three floors without changing outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Jondy

customer_reviews.title: It’s not “bagless”!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not “bagless”. There’s a dust bag that still has to be emptied. With “bagless” vacuums the canister dumps with ease and the dust bag holds all the dirt and hair that needs sticks to the bag when it’s being dumped. You have to shake it to get all the hair out(pets) and at that point you have a cloud of dirt everywhere. It does maneuver with ease and gets in corners and crevices better than a normal vacuum. I’m keeping it but disappointed that it’s not a true “bagless” vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: ShaversL

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love my Hoover backpack vacuum and plan on purchasing another. I do a lot of post construction cleanings as well residential and commercial cleaning and this machine covers everything I need to do. Extremely quiet and easy to dump and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Interstar Cleaning Services

customer_reviews.title: Great Sweeper
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sweeper. I have hardwood and ceramic floors so I needed a sweeper without a beater bar; this sweeper works great for both. It is light weight and has great suction. The attachments interchange easily, I just pull one off and put the one on I need, no turning off the sweeper. I like that the sweeper has a dust collection bag that I can shake out and a filter I can tap clean, no replacing the filter every few weeks. I highly recommend this sweeper.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great vac, great price, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love this vac. Used it on a construction job this morning, the cord is heavy duty and plenty long enough. It came fully assembled, so happy about that. It was easy to put on and strap up. The on/off button could be a bit more accessible but I just turned it on before I strapped it on. I'm very happy, it performed as I expected and am a very happy customer. Now we'll see if it holds up like I'm expecting it will.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: This would be a great purchase especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up as a replacement for my commerical cleaning jobs because of the low price compared to most others. It does a great job on hard surfaces and also does fairly well on entrance way carpets. Very light weight so it can be used all day no problem. Does everything I need it to do. If you use a vacuum bag it will stay clean and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum has great suction easy to empty the bag after each use
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has great suction easy to empty the bag after each use. I have 2 big dogs who come in the house so dog hair has been a problem this vacuum is great for this. Also love how I can go so far under furniture without pulling it out every time. Cord length is long so you can do several rooms before changing outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Howard

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I am already impressed with this product. The suction is fantastic. It is a little heavy, but not bad. Did not bother my shoulders or back and I did the entire house. I would think it was poorly made if it were any lighter. Able to do stairs so much easier, get under furniture and beds. The attachments are great and the cord is longer than the cord on my regular vacuum. Nice since you don't have to use extension or constantly move to a different outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Regina F.

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: I hate cleaning but for some reason I don’t hate this vacuum at all. Works great, but I currently have no carpet and only 2 small rugs. Doesn’t seem like it would do well on rugs. The accessory attachements really are something else. I’m not sure how I was able to make them stay on. I just made sure the metal ring was there as it seems like it’s important for the attachment to be able to latch. I don’t regret the purchase one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using Dyson vacs for years and finally couldn’t stand paying a fortune for mediocre performance. This Hoover is amazing!! It could vacuum the tick off a dogs butt with grace and then some. It makes it so easy to maneuver around the house and get the hardest to reach areas. We haven’t played around with the adapters yet but looking forward to it. Very pleased with our conversion from Dyson to Hoover.
customer_reviews.author: Pete B.

customer_reviews.title: not really for commercial
customer_reviews.text: When holding it by the handle to put it down, it tilts the machine towards the exhaust, the bottom is part of the exhaust and made of brittle and thin plastic. So half the exhaust part broke off on the first job I used it on, setting it down on tile. Maybe, my wife is just used to our old vac which you could just kind of drop and it wouldn't break, I don't know, but it's broken. And I would think doing hardwood floors and tile, it will break for anyone after a while. Unless you handle it with extreme care. But who does on a job ?
customer_reviews.author: John R Haynes

customer_reviews.title: I replace the metal wands with plastic wands so i just had to order the adapter and all is good. Actually saved $50 buying this
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one i have purchased. Should have remembered to buy the vacuum with the 1-1/4-inch attachment kit. I replace the metal wands with plastic wands so i just had to order the adapter and all is good. Actually saved $50 buying this one with the 1-1/2 attachment kit.
customer_reviews.author: Brynn Allen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, I thought it was going to Be as awesome as the other one with different tools and the hoses are way too long!! The gasket around one of the heads came off very easily when vacuuming. It was a waste of money and I’m Soooo disappointing 😒
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's a little heavier that we would have liked, but it makes up for it with suction power. I guess if you want it to clean well, it has to weigh something.
customer_reviews.author: Karen G.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and necessary
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. It's great for when I'm vacuuming the whole house just going from room to room. I also got an additional attachment from Amazon and there's nothing that I can't vacuum up with this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS VACUUM
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum for my business, which is a gym. IT works great and is so much better for you body ergonomically. I wish I would've switched to a back pack vac years ago. It takes a little bit of a learning curve to learn which attachment to use and how to put them on, but once you get the hang of it, it goes smoothly. So far, it's held up pretty well for the cleaning that has to be done at our facility. I'm thinking of buying one for my home, too.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie J. Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I do final construction cleaning on custom built homes for Contractors. This is the second vacuum I have purchased because I have been very happy with the first one. It is very versatile and easy to use. My employees really let using it. Great for vacuuming cabinets and cabinet tops, drawers hardwood floors and carpets. Leigntweight design. Only downfalls it has is that in tight spaces it can make it a little snug and can be slightly loud but not bad. Works great for lighter cleanup, it is not a shop vac and should not be used like one. Great suction power, even after 3 years of use on my original one.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: If you're thinking about it get it it's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to use than any other vacuum I've ever had. It works very well. I bought several aftermarket attachments for it that worked fantastic. It makes everything a breeze. Stairs getting around tables. You cannot possibly go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We saw this vacuum in use at a bed & breakfast a few years ago and bought one for ourselves this year and love it. It’s not light, but an average strength person shouldn’t have any problem with it. I especially like that there is no canister or upright to move around. Use the disposable bags for super easy cleanup and convenience. It’s powerful and the carpet head works wonders on dog hair - we have 3 Saint Bernards. Great product. Liked it so much we bought one for 2 of our older kids for Christmas by their request!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have a two story house and had been using a traditional upright vacuum for years. I bought this and it cut my vacuuming time in half since I didn't have to fight the upright anymore. It is well balanced on my back and is not too heavy. Great suction power. Highly recommend and should have bought it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: CB Texas

customer_reviews.title: This Shop Vac has been all around a nice vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: its light weight and powerful and easy to use! We have a mainly female team and compared to the rolling shop vacs that you can find in Lowes or Home Depot this has been the best shop vac that we've purchased after going through several brands. With gymnastics chalk usually getting everywhere Its our first carry shop vac so this backpack feature alone makes it a lot better than rolling the large clunky one in our gymnastics facility with mats, foam, wires from bars and then random areas of concrete. We haven't had this for a full year (maybe 8 months) so I cant comment on the durability yet but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dont understand the hype
customer_reviews.text: another victim of globalization. A once respected name and brand; now just reduced to crap. Not sure i understand all the glowing reports. This vacuum was really unimpressive for the dollar figure. When will Americans start demanding excellence again?
customer_reviews.author: MarkR

customer_reviews.title: Did not work long, failed after 3 months of light use.
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this product for less than 3 months for a new house cleaning service. The ladies barely used it because they preferred the upright vacuum. Now today it started acting up. After 10 seconds of running the motor slows down, sounds like it is straining and some odor of burning is detectable. Was great when it was working but stop working after little use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tool
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this vacuum. I have been using it for about a month now in my home, and I would say it is the best vacuum I have ever owned. I only wish the company would have provided at least one paper bag filter to go inside, to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Summers-Bair

customer_reviews.title: Not for Rugs...
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted this vacuum to work for me, but, unfortunately, it is not versatile enough for my needs. I was unable to pick up dog hair off of rugs or upholstery effectively with any of the included tools. It does a great job on hardwood or tile floors, but it was ineffective on my rugs, of which I have many.
customer_reviews.author: aj north

customer_reviews.title: Love having it on my back makes it easy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my home 2500 square ft of wood floors. Love having it on my back makes it easy. Doesn't have as good of suction as my shark but works as good as I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: johnblue4637

customer_reviews.title: hoover commercial lightweight backpack vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I just got this vacuum today . I read the instruction which is mostly how to place the vacuum , on your shoulders , the rest looks like common sense . I have back problems, but this items was so light it was totally conferrable ! I JUST VACUUM MY 2000 SQ. FEET WOOD FLOOR'S IN 10 MIN. HAVING FUN.and didn't have to move furniture to get underneath it . I would defiantly recomned this vacuum........ 10 star,s
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: TOO NOISY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum works and is comfortable to wear, BUT IT IS EXTREMELY NOISY!!!! So noisy that the people in my office have to wait for the cleaning crew to pass by and leave the area before they can talk to each other. It's ridiculous. Also really hate the lack of bags that collect debris. We cleaned our office one time, and it was a MESS to empty the fabric dust/dirt collector. Really disappointed and plan on returning it and purchasing another brand.
customer_reviews.author: knowitall

customer_reviews.title: Well needed for our job
customer_reviews.text: Has Great suction power 10 times faster to vacuum New houese with tiles compared to sweeping. Makes mopping way easier and cleaning. Easy cleaning, I would recommend for any vendor cleaning new homes
customer_reviews.author: Drivetodie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this vacuum. We have mostly hardwood and laminate flooring throughout the house. Upright vacuum tends to throw small stones that are brought in on our shoes and other stick vacs don't have enough suction to pick them up. No problem with this unit, very strong suction and the convenience of having both hands free for dusting or moving furniture is great. No canister to drag around and even though I have scoliosis and arthritis in my back I can do all my cleaning with much less discomfort than floor models. Love all the attachments. Wish I would have purchased sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is amazing if you have stairs around the house or places hard to reach, its very lightweight and powerful at the same time, the 20ft cord it comes with makes it much easier to get around anywhere. Small or big business owners would love this for its convenience to vacuum places around your establishment or if you just have a large house with lots of stairs this is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for my cleaning business
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum. Excellent suction and length of tools. I do wish there was more versatility in the attachments. Size and weight are good for me - I’m 5’4 and fits well. Use for my cleaning business.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and more for commercial use
customer_reviews.text: This would be fine for wood flooring, but it's awkward and heavy on your back. Does not do well on carpet, the components are difficult to put together. I missed the return window, my bad.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel D. Reinert

customer_reviews.title: Unit Defective
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. Unit will not turn on. Instructions followed. Trouble-shooters all connections, outlets, cords. Called 1-800 number and after a 20 minute hold, we were told to “call Amazon.” We wanted this unit, but after this experience, it’s going back.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: Goes where most vacuums can’t.
customer_reviews.text: Spent a lot of time reviewing the product line before choosing this Hoover. Suction is awesome. Reaches where my Dyson can’t. A bit tricky getting used to a backpack, but been using it every day for a week so getting the hang of putting it on and off. No issues with unloading the canister. Wish it had an accessory pouch. Nice machine.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this vacuum. I should’ve checked out the pictures posted by previous reviewers. The floor brush broke as I just started to use it. But I am really disappointed, This vacuum has great features, they need to adjust the end floor brush piece and rods, the backpack weight was fine, the way it maneuvered was fine and the suction was decent but that piece on the end screws it up, I’ve waited long time to purchase this products and we had issues. Sad to say I returned the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Barahona

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the house because it would be easier and it did make that HUGE difference, because of the long cord I’m not always moving the the plug to different outlets in each room and dragging around a canister behind me. The weight is not bad once you get the straps in place. I hate vacuuming but this does make it better and quicker
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence A Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, comfy to wear and great extensions. Overall good but I am a little disappointed in the suction power for the price of the unit. Still does what it needs to do though.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Good suction for all those hard to reach places. Straps on easily to climb a chair or ladder for high places. Comes with all the attachments you would ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Paula

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our two German Shepherd house
customer_reviews.text: It is outstanding on our hard tile floor getting into corners and under furniture. Long cord makes it a snap to get the whole main room without changing plugs. Still figuring out how each adaptor benefits us (a couple are not intuitive) and it's not so great on carpet. But it does exactly what we got it for very well.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Hurley III

customer_reviews.title: Cord is huge liability
customer_reviews.text: I've had enough. The 50ft cord is such a royal pain in the ass if you do residential. It always gets caught on something, tangles up EVERY SINGLE DAY which effective turns it into a 10 ft cord, there is no go way to wrap it up, and there is no hook or anything so when you carry it you have to drag it around. Don't buy this for the long cord unless you do long hallways and that's it. Can't recommend it for that and I've had it for 10 months doing two houses a day.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Ager

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Heavy weight cleaner. If you are strong enough to walk around with this on your back you will get good performance from the unit. Very hard to find the on/off switch when the unit is on your back.
customer_reviews.author: Jigsaw

customer_reviews.title: It's a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: Powerful. Heavier than I expected on my back. I love the super long cord, however it's also very heavy. I have all wood floors in a 3 level home so it's been great and the way the hose is made makes it able to easily go under low furniture.
customer_reviews.author: brentford

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum & great price
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum that does well pulling light commercial duty. We use it at home for the dogs and one at our clinic commercially. Nice and light weight!
customer_reviews.author: christian correa

customer_reviews.title: Better than the previous expensive one
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. comfortable. powerful. As advertised NOT GOOD FOR CARPETS but excellent for everything else and for those multi level areas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I knew
customer_reviews.text: Very bulky for a house. Worked well for a few months and then suction diminished. Nothing is “wrong” with it just doesn’t work as well. Instead of sucking up crumbs it pushed them around.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: ... reviews for this product and thought it would be perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I read all of the reviews for this product and thought it would be perfect for what I needed. Unfortunately it is not the quality that I thought it would be. I need more suction power and the attachments are not good quality. I am using this to vacuum a very large private home and I find that the attachments don't swivel and the suction power is definitely not strong enough. Wish I had an opportunity to try it before I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great job at cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job cleaning and comes with different heads for different surfaces. Not to hard to clean the filter but beware it can make a mess when cleaning it out. Only two downsides I can say about it is it will become warm on your back after using it for awhile, and It would handy if the cord could wind up inside some how because some times it can become cumbersome trying to carry the cord around; but with that being said the cord is long so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: George C.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I own a commercial cleaning company and own two of these Hoover Commercial Backpack vacuums and so far so good! I like how they work and love the design. Look very professional pulling these out at jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Scott

customer_reviews.title: easy filter cleaning (bagless) Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Strong suction, long cord, easy filter cleaning (bagless) Cons: NO CARPET TOOL! Can't use on carpets unless you are looking for a rigorous workout/breaking sweat. Can't figure out how I didn't notice this when I ordered it :(
customer_reviews.author: homebrew

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Vacuum!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an awesome vacuum, that we bought a second one! We absolutely love this machine. We have a cleaning business, and it makes the work go so much faster. I HIGHLY recommend this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be improved
customer_reviews.text: Attachments don't stay on well even with the silver ring at the end if the hose. Suction is pretty good too, but I wish it was more than one small suction hole. Would be much more effective if the suction opening was wider. You will break out in a sweat if used for prolonged period of time. Back gets slightly warm
customer_reviews.author: dimpulz82

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for cleaning large spaces. The only thing I'd want is a attachment that glides easier on low knap carpet and a handle. Other than that I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shekinah Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great suction!
customer_reviews.text: We are either too rough on the vacuum or it it’s not very heavy duty. Or we use it to much too often. I have a professional cleaning business and we use it for both our residential and commercial. I am still in startup but if you could use it only for commercial properties I would do just that. Using it to do everything puts a lot of ware and tare on the vacuum. Definitely invest into two if you plan to use it everyday
customer_reviews.author: Top2Bottom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and light
customer_reviews.text: This is my third hoover vacuum and is really light weight and easy to Move around with it, i clean churches and schools and they run 40 Hours a week with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Diana v

customer_reviews.title: Good quality...definitely commercial grade
customer_reviews.text: This vac has amazingly powerful suction. I've used Oreck and Dyson, and this beats them hands down. The parts are sturdy and can really take abuse, not like the dainty plastic parts of Dyson. It is however not a vac that you can whip out for small jobs. It's for the major weekend cleaning since, size wise, it's the SUV of vacs. Plan on a small Dirt Devil for the small daily pickups. If you are on the weak side, this might not be for you. I'm 5 ft and 95 lb, so this can wear me out after about an hour or more of lugging it around. Overall, I love it. It does what it claims to do...SUCK!
customer_reviews.author: Linh

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted. It took a few tries to get the accessories all plugged in and then I was off to do some cleaning where our robots don't go. Yes, I could have pulled out the other vacuum cleaner but this has so much more power and I didn't have to worry about it rolling down the stairs. Looks solidly built, not too loud and I'll play Ghostbusters as I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum worked for 2 months a s then stopped
customer_reviews.author: cecile

customer_reviews.title: As expected and more
customer_reviews.text: Once I got the hang of the attachments and the back pack adjustments, I found the system to be very easy to use and incredibly time saving. The space for which the vacuum is being primarily used is difficult to navigate with more traditional canister or upright vacuums. But, the backpack system is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Yound

customer_reviews.title: A little bulky but good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Needed a backpack vacuum for the expansion of my business. It os convenient having it as a backpack, you can cover more ground quickly. I'm not a bagless fan so I don't know if i will keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Blue

customer_reviews.title: Should have stuck with an Oreck.. Lesson learned
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum works great so far, but in my opinion "lightweight" is quite misleading when describing this particular machine. It's a bit awkward, and bulky, and a lot heavier than I was hoping for. I clean houses as my profession, and I must say that this isn't easy to use when you have to clean a house with narrow hallways, or lots of furniture. I find myself running into things left and right.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever
customer_reviews.text: I just got home at 3:05 pm, it’s 3:25 now. I took the vacuum out of the box and put it together and already vacuumed the whole house already and put it away. This thing is the best vacuum ever! I was kinda worried it would just be another vacuum to add to the collection, but this is above all the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned!
customer_reviews.text: The suction on this stinks. Do not clean like a “commercial” vac. I do not recommend this product at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Juzslim

customer_reviews.title: Bulky backpack vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Bulky item, can easily knock items off wall etc with it so bulky as strapped to your back. Also the commercial extension cord should be more user friendly collapsible cord and would weigh less.
customer_reviews.author: Ryeguy2448

customer_reviews.title: Pain to use. Breaks.
customer_reviews.text: The cord is a pain. After a year the hose is held together with duct tape. The end wondering stay on. The mental fell off...after writint mt review inrelaoze I need to lower the rating. In fact i bought 2 more vacuums because this one is such a pain
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Ryan Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Works great, reasonably priced vs competition and easy to lug ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for cleaning my condo building (10 unit building in Boston). Works great, reasonably priced vs competition and easy to lug around and clean. Can be a bit bulky in some regards but it is not a huge compromise given it's performance and ease. Comes with its own, really long extension cord and reusable filter which I really liked as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Just because its half price of other vacs of this type doesn’t mean it’s not as good! Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cleaning business and this little guy is lightweight and the suction is very powerful! I bought a different one at my local vacuum store and caompared to my vac pac vacuum I purchased at my local vacuum store for $429, I would say it is just as good for almost half the price!! Great little machine!! I’m very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A Marston

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but not very helpful documentation or phone support
customer_reviews.text: Works well! Except for a ring that was missing in the accessories Had to read other peoples reviews to fix the issue as their own phone support was less than ideal.. Nice product but not very helpful documentation or phone support.
customer_reviews.author: spaw

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, easy to carry and great suction. Get' s the job done!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's everything you need in a commercial vacuum. Fits comfortable on shoulder and very easy to carry around. My boyfriend loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Anesha Harripersaud

customer_reviews.title: really easy to get curtains or cobwebs with it as well ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a house cleaner and use it for big homes with a lot of tile or hard wood. really easy to get curtains or cobwebs with it as well am I'm doing the floors. It's WAY HARDER to use on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Parker

customer_reviews.title: If your thinking about it buy it you wont regret it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Only drawback is the wand part has a little wierd bend you have to get used to. Otherwise we use it ever where!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Fryer

customer_reviews.title: vacuum works perfect for a house with a ton of hard wood
customer_reviews.text: I have a ton of hardwood floors in my home so I purchased this for cleaning the floors, it made it so much easier to just vacuum then mop instead of having to sweep, vacuum works perfect for a house with a ton of hard wood!
customer_reviews.author: William Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I get about 1000 square feet done and need to clean it out because it looses suction. It’s a bit of a mess to clean out as well. Dust flies all over the trash. Not impressed 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: HOOVER great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This vacuums are great, I love them, I run a business (House cleaning services) in Albuquerque, NM area and this product is fantastic, is easy to clean, is light to have in our backs, not that noisy, has the filters and all, I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Monny_mama

customer_reviews.title: I am absolutely satisfied! I highly recommend this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 4 of these vacuums for my small cleaning company. I am absolutely satisfied! I highly recommend this vacuum. I love that the inner liner is washable. You can also order filters that are reusable and washable. Great vacuum! It's so easy to use and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Mariela Williams

product_meta.title: Hoover Commercial Lightweight Backpack Vacuum, C2401,Black
product_meta.description: You don't have to vacuum in pain or in any discomfort with the Hoover C2401 Shoulder Vac commercial backpack vacuum cleaner. This handy vacuum cleaner stores all of its collected dust and debris in a backpack canister, allowing you to clean without any obstructions. As one year-old toddlers often weigh less than 10 lbs., so does the C2401 backpack vacuum! The C2401 vacuum cleaner is also compact so that you can clean out narrow passageways, small spaces, as well as large areas with ease and comfort. The C2401 can carry up to 6.4 quarts of dust and debris. You can also monitor its dust capacity with its clear dome lid so it is easy to know when to empty its collection bag. The C2401 can be used with a shake out cloth liner or with a disposable paper bag insert, allowing you the flexibility of choices and options needed for a versatile cleaning job. HEPA filters, like that included in a C2401 back pack vacuum cleaner, eliminates up to 99.97% of particles 0.3 microns or smaller. That means that allergens such as dust mite debris, dust mites, pollen, and much more are trapped and locked away. Attachment Kit: Includes backpack, 60" positive locking hose, 38" two piece straight metal wands, 6" crevice tool, 11" turbo floor tool, 2" dusting brush and 4" upholstery tool.
feature_bullets: Lightweight design weighs less than 10 pounds allows for superior mobility
Chiropractor designed harness reduces user strain
Quiet Operation- clean without disrupting the environment around you
Extra long, 48 foot 3-wire quick change power cord- switch outlets less often between cleans
Includes an accessory pack with 6" crevice tool, 11" turbo floor tool, 2" dusting brush and 4" upholstery tool

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
